Package handist.collections.glb

Contains the routines of the Global Load Balancer for the Distributed Collection Library

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGlbHandle
    Abstract handle gathering common operations and routine to all GLB handles of distributed collections
    Config
    Helper class for the settings that influence the behavior of the Global Load Balancer.
    DistColGlb<T>
    This class proposes various operations that operate on all the elements of a DistCol as part of a GLB program.
    DistColGlbTask
    Implementation of GlbTask for the DistCol distributed collection.
    DistFuture<R>
    DistFuture represents the progress of an operation that can take place under GLB
    DistMapGlb<K,V>
    This class proposes a number of operations that can be performed on a DistMap as part of a GLB program.
    GlobalLoadBalancer
    Class presenting the static method under which GLB operations can operate.
    TimeoutBlocker
    ForkJoinPool.ManagedBlocker implementation that blocks a thread in the ForkJoinPool used by the APGAS runtime until a certain moment in time.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DistColGlb.DistColGlbError
    Runtime exception used when a Throwable is thrown from a closure given as parameter of a Glb operation.

Package handist.collections.glb Description

Contains the routines of the Global Load Balancer for the Distributed Collection Library
